resources.string:
With VeganFuel you can quickly look up vegan foods rich with a specific nutrient.

The app uses the open USDA nutrition API for the data:
https://ndb.nal.usda.gov

Created and maintained by Andrey Galchevski.
The code for the app is available at: 
https://github.com/AndreyGalchevski/veganfuel-android
